text: Albert Pobor (29 May 1956 – 3 March 2022) was a Croatian football manager. Pobor was born in Banja Luka, Yugoslavia. His career began in 2004 with Cerezo Osaka. He managed NK Hrvatski Dragovoljac from 2008 until 2009 and again from 2014 until 2015. The last team he managed was NK Brežice 1919 from 2017 until 2018. Pobor died on 3 March 2022 in Zagreb, Croatia. He was 65 years old. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Croatian football managers Category:Cerezo Osaka managers Category:People from Banja Luka
title: Albert Pobor
